1. Project Summary

Project Name: To-Do List Application
Technologies Used:

HTML ‚Äì Structure

CSS ‚Äì Styling & layout

JavaScript ‚Äì Logic, DOM manipulation, Local Storage

Purpose of the Project:
This project allows users to add, view, edit, update, and delete tasks. All tasks are stored in the browser using Local Storage, so the data remains even after refreshing the page.

2. Main Functionalities of the Project

Add a new task

Display tasks in a table

Edit an existing task

Update task details

Delete a task

Store tasks permanently using localStorage
